name: linter-aspell
description: Atom linter plugin for spell checking, using scspell
readme:
# linter-aspell package

This is a **linter-aspell** plugin for [Linter](https://github.com/AtomLinter/Linter). It
is an interface to [aspell](https://aspell.net).

### Requirements
*Linter* package must be installed in order to use this plugin. If *Linter* is not
installed, please follow the instructions [here](https://github.com/AtomLinter/Linter).

### Installation
To use a plugin, you must ensure that `aspell` is installed on your
system.### Screenshot
![img](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spockNinja/linter-scspell/master/screenshot.png)
